Name: IsTranslated
Description: Indicates whether content is a translation (true) or an original (false).

Name: IsTranslatable
Description: Indicates whether content is translatable (true) or not (false). An example of something that is not translatable would be a MNEMONIC of an object or a number.

Name: TranslationSourceLanguage
Description: List the language or language codes. The language original may or may not be provided in this bundle of language specific strings.

Name: TranslationDate
Description: The date the content was translated. Provision of translation date allows user to verify if translation was available during data collection or other time linked activity.

Name: TextFormat
Description: Specifies the format of the text content. Examples: text/plain is preferred, text/html, application/xhtml+xml, etc. see https://www.w3.org/2003/01/xhtml-mimetype/ for additional options. Example of vendor specific: text/vnd.example.markdown

Name: Scope
Description: Allows the provision of denoting of named section. Identification of a content sections would be the combination of language and scope, i.e. if more than one section is in English they must have different scope designations.
